parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the value will be passed in the argument list (ie. the switch won't be used)
Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be joined together with no space between them.
parameter_list.helptext: Write output to file of this name.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be joined together with no space between them.
parameter_list.helptext: Do not discard search results with PeptideProphet probabilities below this value.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be joined together with no space between them.
parameter_list.helptext: Minimum peptide length considered in the analysis (default 7).

value.display: Do not use icat information in PeptideProphet.
Use N-glyc motif information in PeptideProphet.
Use Hydrophobicity / RT information in PeptideProphet.
Force the fitting of the mixture model, bypass automatic mixture model checks.
Use accurate mass binning in PeptideProphet.
Warning instead of exit with error if instrument types between runs is different.
Exclude all entries with asterisked score values in PeptideProphet.
Leave alone all entries with asterisked score values in PeptideProphet.
Use hardcoded default initialization parameters of the distributions.
Use Non-parametric model, can only be used with decoy option.
Do not use the NTT model.
Do not use the NMC model.
Use Gamma Distribution to model the Negatives (applies only to X!Tandem data).
Only use Expect Score as the Discriminant(applies only to X!Tandem data, helpful for data with homologous top hits e.g. phospho or glyco).
Report decoy hits with a computed probability based on the model learned.
Do not create png data plot.
Do not assemble protein groups in ProteinProphet analysis.
Do not use Occam's Razor in ProteinProphet analysis to derive the simplest protein list to explain observed peptides.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be joined together with no space between them.
parameter_list.helptext: PeptideProphet options.

value.display: Run ProteinProphet on the iProphet results.
Do not use number replicate spectra model.
Do not use number sibling ions model.
Do not use number sibling mods model.
Do not use numbe of sibling searches model.
Do not use number of sibling MS/MS runs model.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be joined together with no space between them.
parameter_list.helptext: This value needs to be <str>,<num> and will change XPRESS residue mass difference for <str> to <num> (Default 9.0). Possible string values are --, A, C, D, E, F, G, H, I, K, L, M, N, P, Q, R, S, T, V, W, Y, n, c.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Heavy labeled peptide elutes before light labeled partner.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be joined together with no space between them.
parameter_list.helptext: Should be a <num> value and will fix elution peak area as +-<num> scans from peak apex (default 5).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: For ratio, set/fix light to 1, vary heavy.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: For ratio, set/fix light to 1, vary light.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: For 15N metabolic labelling. Ignore all other parameters, assume IDs are normal and quantify with corresponding 15N heavy pair.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: For 15N metabolic labelling. Ignore all other parameters, assume IDs are 15N heavy and quantify with corresponding 14N light pair.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: For 13C metabolic labelling. Ignore all other parameters, assume IDs are normal and quantify with corresponding 13C heavy pair.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: For 13C metabolic labelling. Ignore all other parameters, assume IDs are 13C heavy and quantify with corresponding 12C light pair.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Heavy labeled peptide elutes before light labeled partner.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be joined together with no space between them.
parameter_list.helptext: AreaFlag set to this value (ratio display option).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Static modification quantification (i.e. each run is either all light or all heavy).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Use fixed scan range for light and heavy.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Quantitate only the charge state where the CID was made

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Return a ratio even if the background is high.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the switch will be passed in the argument list.
parameter_list.helptext: Set all background to zero.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be joined together with no space between them.
parameter_list.helptext: Specified label masses (e.g. M74.325Y125.864), only relevant for static modification quantification.

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated joined with an equals(=) character with no spaces.
parameter_list.helptext: Set the number of previous AAs recorded for a peptide hit (default 1).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated joined with an equals(=) character with no spaces.
parameter_list.helptext: Set the number of following AAs recorded for a peptide hit (default 1).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated joined with an equals(=) character with no spaces.
parameter_list.helptext: For proteins which start with value and not found in refresh database, keep original protein names instead of NON_EXISTENT.
